name: SKI MINER
description:
Play as a brave miner who ventures on the frosty slopes of an arctic environment. His job is to collect as much resources as possible and avoid the obstacles.

This game was made for Breda University of Applied Sciences CMGT programming intake. 

Done in Buas Template ( 3dgep template) using C++.

Template link:

  • https://www.3dgep.com/cpp-fast-track-2-template/

CONTROLS:

  • MOUSE - Move around
  • Q - Mine left
  • E - Mine right
  • P - Pause
  • ESC - Quit
